Changes
-------

0.2.6 (2012-02-03)
------------------
* updated to Solr 3.5

0.2.5 (2011-12-07)
------------------
* minor fixes
* documentation update

0.2.4 (2011-11-23)
------------------
* support for setting the rendering URL base

0.2.3 (2011-11-21)
------------------
* removed batch mode (too error-prone)

0.2.2 (2011-11-15)
------------------
* better dealing with filenames containing non-ascii
  characters

0.2.1 (2011-11-15)
------------------
* added experimental support for indexing binary files
  (PDF, DOC)

0.2.0 (2011-11-15)
------------------

* documentation updated
* documentation reorganized in order to support packages.python.org
* support for tagging
* bugfixes

0.1.0 (2011-11-11)
------------------

* initial release
  [ajung]
